name: Classic FreeCell (Free)
description:
Classic FreeCell solitaire game. Looks and feels just as old desktop PC FreeCell that we played for a long time. Same scoring system, graphics, king image.

Features
- 3 different card styles: retro, modern and fancy
- timed and untimed gameplay
- unlimited turn undo's
- automated moves
- double tap to move card to free cell
- jumping victory cards
- super moves for card stacks
